metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20840 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. libvncserver/ws_decode.c can lead to a crash because of unaligned accesses in hybiReadAndDecode.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20840` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libvncserver-config - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libvncserver1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3').
x11vnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
